title: Re: Bazooka Bear and the 4 legendary lamps.(a keen mod)
content:
I suggest using hex editor, that way you can get better control of the files. Good luck with the mod. As well, if you're going to make levels with notepad (if I understood correctly), I really recommend hex editor on that.

title: Re: Bazooka Bear and the 4 legendary lamps.(a keen mod)
content:
Try [url=http://andy.durdin.net/keen/modding/viewforum.php?f=16]iKeen[/url]. It's a good Windows Keen 1-3 editor. It has some bugs, though - not enough to significantly disrupt your project, but make sure to back up your mod regularly.
My [url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?grafix5000]MindBending Power[/url] is 5.43 points.
Possibly the [url=http://legion.gibbering.net/misterx/troutwar.php?s=grafix5000]funniest thing[/url] on the interweb.
Go to [url=http://www.toxicsheep.com]www.toxicsheep.com[/url] to see my site!

[img]http://www.toxicsheep.com/sigs/scrobblersig.php[/img]
